mapper.select: select id, name, sex, brithday, telPhone, email, address, identificationId, education, school, profession, nationality, politicalStatus, entryTime, expireDate, departmentId, positionId, baseSalary, positionSalary, subsidy, insuranceStandard, employeeStatus from employeeinfo where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
